title: Welcome to my website!
text:
About (the academic) me

I am an Assistant Professor (RtdB) at the Department of Statistics of University of Padua.
Previously, I held the role of Assistant Professor (RtdA) at the Department of Statistics of Università Cattolica del Sacro Cuore - Milan.
Prior to that, I spent two years as a Postdoctoral Scholar at the Department of Statistics of Univerisity of California - Irvine, working under the supervision of Professor Babak Shahbaba.
I obtained a Ph.D. in Statistics at University of Milan - Bicocca and Università della Svizzera italiana (joint program, awarded with honors) working with Professor Antonietta Mira and Professor Michele Guindani.
I am interested in Bayesian mixtures, Bayesian nonparametrics, model-based clustering, shrinkage priors, and dimensionality reduction.
  Email address    Google Scholar profile    GitHub profile    LinkedIn profile

[2024/02/21] I joined the Department of Statistics at the University of Padua as a senior Assistant Professor (RtdB)
